phrases: Hey, what do you think of Akira?
She is the most levelheaded of the Three Great Water Fairies.
She is organized, dependable, and takes charge.
Well, it is more like nothing...
What do you mean by nothing?
You are really not making any sense.
What do you mean by nothing?
You are really not making any sense.
It is not something you two would understand.
Dear Ai, it is been so warm here in Neo-Venezia lately that I find myself breaking into a sweat.
We switched into our summer clothes!
I heard you worked on a traghetto recently?
After it was over, it motivated me to work even harder.
I cannot afford to lose to you!
Now that we have changed into our summer uniforms, let us give it all we have got during practice!
I wish I could see you and the others in your summer uniforms again.
I am sure they will be a breath of fresh air as Neo-Venezia changes seasons.
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
I want to spend my days waving to you Itsumademo te o furitai hibi
This is my proof that I was here with you Koko ni tashika ni kimi to ita akashi
There is a path which stretches on ahead Kono saki mo tsuzuiteru michi ga aru
When you climb the next hill, Tsugi no saka o nobottara
Let us meet again Mata aimashou
I heard a really good bakery opened around here somewhere...
I will go ask that shopkeeper over there.
Her voice is wonderful, no matter how many times you hear it.
Her voice is wonderful, no matter how many times you hear it.
Now, back to work, back to work!
Her voice truly is heavenly, is not it?
Athena's singing voice is the one thing about her that is really amazing.
Back to work, back to work...
You know, no matter how many times I see her sculling...
She always has such wonderful, graceful, masterly oar control, does not she?
Athena and Alicia were both amazing just now, were not they?
If only we had their incredible talents,
we would be promoted to Primas in no time.
But I do not think Alicia's graceful demeanor and Athena's singing voice...
Those two were bestowed with natural talent.
They are actually geniuses, do not you think?
True, Athena's voice is one in a hundred...
Well, you could say her clumsiness is one in a thousand, too.
Being so close to two such extraordinary Undines the whole time...
But Akira's really, really amazing, too.
She is the most levelheaded and hardworking of the three, do not you think?
Yeah, I guess you are right.
We are going right back to practice once we are done eating, okay?
Akari, you look lovely in your summer uniform.
Ah, Akari, you look nice and cool in that uniform!
Yes, it is very cool and comfortable.
Oh, you already switched to your summer uniform?
As always, she is a genius at making friends.
It looks nice on you, Akari!
As always, she is a genius at making friends.
She really looks happier than usual, too.
I am, because everyone could feel the coming of summer by seeing my uniform.
It feels as though I have become a part of Neo-Venezia's wonderful summer.
It feels as though I have become a part of Neo-Venezia's wonderful summer.
Are not you going to scold her today?
Those two were bestowed with natural talent.
They are actually geniuses, do not you think?
But compared to being gifted with natural talent...
How many days has it been since you started?!
I am doing it a bit at a time, in between work.
Besides, your stuff is blocking the hallway!
I am... not... going to... help...
Cleaning your room is like cleaning your heart.
It feels great when it is clean, does not it?
Oh, you found some nostalgic stuff there.
This photo is back from when Athena was promoted to a Prima.
Between the three of us, I was promoted last.
It was difficult, was not it?
It was painful, was not it?!
I know you hate to lose...
So it definitely must have... hurt...
Working hard was not enough to make me a Prima.
That is why I ended up taking longer than those two.
Was not it hard for you?
After getting left behind as the only Single, I was really depressed.
Their rank and mine were two separate issues.
How can you be so strong?
What is it that gives you the strength...
Can I tell you an old story?
It was when Athena got promoted to Prima after Alicia.
Yeah, it was right after we took this photo.
To think the day would come when Athena would become a Prima...
Now it is your turn, Akira.
They always say, Save the best for last!
My heart sinks when I smile in their presence.
This anxious feeling that I might get left behind... it refuses to leave me...
They were born with extraordinary gifts that I do not possess.
I wonder if there is a four-leaf?
I always tried not to think about it.
Am I really one of the unblessed?
There are blessed, special people who can become Primas...
Hey lady, are you looking for a four-leaf clover?
If I recall correctly, she is the daughter of Himeya's owner...
Is there something on my face?
Of course she would not know who I am.
An ordinary Single Undine like me...
You can tell there are not any four-leaf clovers here because it is such a small flowerbed.
Why do not you give up?
You do not have what you do not have.
You do not have... what you do not have...
If you do not have something, all you need to do is make it!
I like this kind a lot better!
Look, this red rose petal is your heart.
Now you will be okay, right, Miss?
At that moment, a girl much younger than I taught me something very precious.
If a genius is someone who is been bestowed with a gift from the heavens...
Yes... I will become a prodigy!
I guess she does not remember.
Aika, you can have that bookmark if you want.
B-But is not this your precious treasure?
Yup, and it is also an effective good luck charm for aspiring Primas.
Ah, Akira, this red petal is from a rose, right?
Could this be where you got your alias Crimson Rose from?
Well, well, I wonder about that one!
Geez, I will do it, so just watch.
No one knows what their talents may be.
But I have something that no one can beat.
I have the best person in the world, the person I am most proud of, by my side.
That is a wonderful miracle that Neo-Venezia itself created...
I just said a sappy line!
You are really not making any sense...
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
As my thoughts focus intently on someone, Dareka no koto o tsuyoku omou toki
Love rests on my palm, held high Kakageta te no hira ni ai ga tomaru
A future guided by the flow of water and wind Mizu no yukue to kaze ga shimesu mirai
I gaze at the hope that surrounds this world Kono hoshi o tsusumu kibou mitsumete
The distant clouds of light are beckoning now Tooi kumo hikari ga sasou you ni yureru i am about to
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
